props.name: autofocus
props.description: Sets the focus on this field when the form loads. Only the first field with this label gets

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the field is no longer editable and will not be saved

props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID. The component _uid will be used as default.

props.name: layout
props.description:
You can set the layout to `list` to extend the width of each tag
to 100% and show them in a list. This is handy in narrow columns
or when a list is a more appropriate design choice for the input
in general.

props.name: max
props.description: The maximum number of accepted tags

props.name: min
props.description: The minimum number of required tags
